titles.title: True Cost of Dairy Farming Act of 1997

To require that the Secretary of Agriculture include an estimate of the cost to produce milk whenever the Secretary announces the basic formula price for milk to be used under Federal milk marketing orders.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy and Poultry.

bill.summary: 9/16/1997--Introduced. True Cost of Dairy Farming Act of 1997 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to include an estimate of milk production costs in announcing the basic formula price for milk.
